Package ru.nsu.berezin.blackjack

Class RuWriterReaderInterface

java.lang.Object
ru.nsu.berezin.blackjack.RuWriterReaderInterface
All Implemented Interfaces:
GameInterface
public class RuWriterReaderInterface extends Object implements GameInterface
Interface that implements game logic using `Writer` and `Reader` for interaction with the player.

  • Constructor Summary

  • Method Details

    • setGameState

      public void setGameState(GameState state)
      Description copied from interface: GameInterface
      Sets the game state. Every other callback will be called only when the event happens in the state that is passed to this method.
      Specified by:
      setGameState in interface GameInterface
      Parameters:
      state - - state of the game. It should not be mutated by the interface.
